definitions: the action or process of giving new energy or vigor to something

examples.text: plans for the rejuvenation of the area

shortDefinitions: process of giving new energy or vigour to something

definitions: the restoration of a youthful appearance to something

examples.text: experts in the art of facial rejuvenation

shortDefinitions: restoration of youthful appearance to something

definitions: the action of restoring a river or stream to a condition characteristic of a younger landscape

examples.text: they were instrumental in the rejuvenation of the river

shortDefinitions: action of restoring river or stream to condition characteristic of younger landscape
